[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Comprehensive income with a value of 2,553,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Profit (loss) and Other comprehensive income ( 2,406,000,000 + 22,000,000 ) with a value of 2,428,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2018-01-01 to 2018-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember Unit : USD Decimals of Comprehensive income : -6 Decimals of Profit (loss) : -6 Decimals of Other comprehensive income : -6
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23/2020-12-31/ESEF/GB/1/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31.zip/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31/reports/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31-T01.html 72164

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Consolidated statement of income but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 6,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.evraz.com/role/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 110,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.evraz.com/role/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2018-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of OtherReserves : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23/2020-12-31/ESEF/GB/1/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31.zip/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31/reports/5493005B7DAN39RXLK23-2020-12-31-T01.html 69383
